alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:38PM CDT until June 17 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GEORGE...SOUTHEASTERN PERRY AND SOUTHWESTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 537 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McLain, or 16 miles west of Leakesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McLain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
